Attributes(java.util.jar.Attributes).Description: Constructs a new Attributes object with the same attribute name-value mappings as in the specified Attributes.

Attributes().Description: Constructs a new, empty Attributes object with default size.

ClassDesc: The Attributes class maps Manifest attribute names to associated string values. Valid attribute names are case-insensitive, are restricted to the ASCII characters in the set [0-9a-zA-Z_-], and cannot exceed 70 characters in length. Attribute values can contain any characters and will be UTF8-encoded when written to the output stream. See the
